int Calc::RleFile::read ( void *  buf,
int  nbyte 
)

This method reads and decodes data from a file.

Parameters
bufA pointer to the destination memory
nbyteThe maximum number of bytes to read
Returns
The number of bytes read after decoding
int Calc::RleFile::write ( const void *  buf,
int  nbyte 
)

This method encodes then writes the data to a file.

Parameters
bufThe source data
nbyteThe number of bytes to encode and write
Returns
The number of un-encoded bytes that were written
